title: Arrowsmith - So Smart In Their Fine Uniforms TPB
description:
Imagine a world where magic is real. It's the First World War and instead of planes and bombs the allies and Central Powers use spells, dragons and other mystical creatures in the an attempt to turn the tide in their favour. The story centers on Fletcher Arrowsmith, as he joins the war effort on the side of the Allies and is taught the rudiments of sorcery and engages in brutal battles with the enemy Prussians.

Written by fantasy comic book writer Kurt Busiek and pencilled by Carlos Pacheco.


Released on http://ComicPirates.info
